body_html:
I had the same problem and it went away after updating to bazel 0.11.0

The configuration I had when I saw that error:

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Python version: 2.7.12
Bazel version: Build label: 0.7.0- (@non-git)
gcc version 5.4.0 (GCC)
No GPU
No CUDA

The configuration that works is the same, except:

Bazel version: Build label: 0.11.0- (@non-git)

body:
I had the same problem and it went away after updating to bazel 0.11.0

The configuration I had when I saw that error:

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Python version: 2.7.12
Bazel version: Build label: 0.7.0- (@non-git)
gcc version 5.4.0 (GCC)
No GPU
No CUDA

The configuration that works is the same, except:

Bazel version: Build label: 0.11.0- (@non-git)
